subtitle: Experience!
content:
My background is in Electrical Engineering from ğŸ“ SJSU. I lived in Japan ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ for 4 years working as a UI/UX Design Engineer. It was a sink or swim situation so I taught myself to speak Japanese without any prior knowledge. I'm a quick learner and take great pride and find enjoyment in building things that wow ğŸ¤©!
My past life in Tech sales, molded me into an exceptional communicator with a natural ability to explain complex concepts simply. I may not have professional experience as a developer...yet. HOWEVER, what I lack in experience I make up for in tenacity and the ability to learn quickly ğŸš€. The projects on this site and my GitHub repo (@saizen408) serve as evidence that I possess the mental aptitude to rise to any challenge you might throw my way.
I'm looking for a team that's willing to give a guy courageous enough to follow his passion a chance. If you happen to be those individuals, you'll have a teammate who is consistently one of the hardest workers on your squad and will stop at nothing to accomplish the goals before him. ğŸ˜¤
